title: Intermittent Unauthorized with GraphQL
body:
### Describe the bug

It seems that under load, a secured GraphQL endpoint sometimes fails to properly authorize, and throws an `unauthorized` error.
This sometimes surfaces as intermittent failures of `io.quarkus.smallrye.graphql.deployment.ConcurrentAuthTest`. 

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

Run `io.quarkus.smallrye.graphql.deployment.ConcurrentAuthTest` many times in a row until it fails. It failed on my laptop after ~50 runs. Perhaps increase the number of threads/iterations in the test to make it fail more often.
